system.special: Rune Wep, Proven (4), Tainted, Tearing, Balanced
system.note:
The Master-Crafted Midnight Blade of the Wanderer of Worlds, Forgemaster Mehnix. Weapon may only be summoned in the presence of a worthy enemy. In addition to listed statistics can be switched to one of 5 modes as a Free Action, starts in Lightning Mode by default. - Lightning: (Shocking Quality, Ranged Attack (Basic, S/-/-, 100m, 2d10+5 E, Pen 8, Shocking, Fires Beam Pierces all enemies (make Agility test to dodge), doesn't extend past listed range or through sufficient blocking material)
- Fire: (Flame Quality, Can be thrown SBx5 Metres, Ranged Attack (Basic, S/-/-, 30m, 1d10+5, Pen 2, Flame, Spray)
- Water (Flexible Quality, Melee Range 5m, attacks can hit around corners and ignore cover within this range)
- Wind (Storm Quality, Ranged Attack (250m, S/-/-, 2d10+5 I, Pen 5, Accurate, Lance, Felling (8))
- Earth (Concussive (2) and Blast (2) Quality, Blast does not effect wielder).
Celebration of my obsession, and 1000 weapons catalogued.
